verbs.description: [ARG0: pizza shop employee] [V: makes] [ARG1: 225-mile delivery for cancer patient a michigan pizza shop] usually does n't deliver but an employee made a big exception to bring a pair of pizzas to a cancer patient and his wife 225 miles away in indiana indianapolis julie morgan battle creek michigan wichita steve dalton shaffer rich morgan sydney west kellogg indiana 225-mile pizza
